Next, I'll look for Mike Sims-Walker. Scanning down, I find Mike Sims  - walker (note the extra space in his name as per the table) in the third row. His college is listed as Central Florida, not Florida. This indicates that while he was drafted, he's not from Florida College.

- Mike Sims-Walker: Drafted but from Central Florida.
